p: The collected mosquitoes were rapidly anesthetized (about 1 min) with ethyl acetate-soaked cotton inside the sealed collection tube, then transferred to 5 mL test tubes, identified with the place and date of collection, stored at −70 °C, and transported in liquid nitrogen (−196 °C) to the Instituto Evandro Chagas (IEC) in Ananindeua, Pará, for taxonomic identification and molecular analysis.
